channel.title: Patch that does like GRM Tools Freeze plugin
channel.description:
So is it possible to make a Patch that does like GRM Tools Freeze plugin ?! i would love to be able to "live stream" a piece of audio and freeze a part of it, and be able to decide where in the sample it should loop, how long and so.. im a bit on shaky grounds here :slight_smile:
I suspect its possible to buffer sound into the sdram or something but how would one do that sorry for being all neewbie here :D

item.title: Patch that does like GRM Tools Freeze plugin
item.dc:creator: @Sputnki Filippo Tamagnini
item.description:
@Sputnki wrote:

Granular synthesis. I made a couple objects about it, the problem is that for such a smooth playback a huge number of grains is required (and that requires more resources than axoloti actually has)
I also suspect that the window shape (the amplitude envelope for grains) is important to achieve a smoother sound. Again, the problem is that "curved" window shapes, like hanning, hamming, tapered cosine, welch, etc require more calculations than a simple triangular or rectangular shape.
